attributes.action: Scrap the Monopoly that Hull Daily Mail hold in Hull for local newspaper readers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hull residents have no choice but to use Hull Daily Mail to access local printed news. We are missing out on superior reporting provided by the likes of our local BBC office. It is ironic that William Wilberforce was from Hull but Hull residents are still held as politicians by Hull Daily Mail. The level of reporting offered by Hull Daily Mail is well below par and usually also very biased. Surely competition is a good thing. We want a local choice for our printed news! Peter Levy for Editor!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
